attributes.action: arrange for MP's expenses to be subject to the same tax regime as the expenses of other employees and for any benefit (beyond the agreed salary) to be recovered by the State
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: HMRC has powers to ensure that any employee who receives benefits above the pay that is subjected to PAYE is subjected to tax on those benefits. Those powers and procedures should be applied to MPs and their expenses to ensure that there is no element of benefit over the remuneration agreed by Parliament. Any such benefits should be recovered by the State.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
